meanings.meaning: 1. living; life 死中に活を求める。Your gift was like discovery of an oasis in the midst of a desert.

meanings.meaning: 1. to live; to exist
2. to make a living; to subsist
3. to be in effect; to be in use; to function この本はまだ版権が生きている。This book is still copyrighted.
4. to come to life; to be enlivened
5. to be safe (in baseball, go, etc.)

1. practical use; application; making good use of; putting to good use; capitalizing on 政治家として、彼は、演技のうまさを目一杯活用している。As a politician, he makes utmost use of his acting ability.
2. conjugation; inflection Grammar英語を学習する上で不可欠な、不規則動詞の活用。Conjugation of irregular verbs - essential for those learning English.

meanings.type: Adverb (fukushi), Adverb taking the 'to' particle, Suru verb
meanings.meaning: 1. in a lively way; vividly; freshly; animatedly; actively; energetically

1. activity (esp. energetic or successful); great efforts; active participation 仕事でご活躍ですね。I see you're doing very well in your business.
2. walking about with great vigor 元気で活躍していることと思います。I hope things have been going well for you.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to make (the best) use of; to put to good use; to leverage (skills, attributes, experience, etc.); to capitalise on (experience, etc.) 彼はわずかな収入を精一杯活かした。He made the best of his small income.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to let live; to keep alive Only applies to 生かす自分も生き、他人も生かせ。Live and let live.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to revive; to resuscitate; to bring back to life Only applies to 生かす心停止の患者を応急処置で生かした。We used emergency measures to revive the cardiac arrest patient.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to restore (a deleted passage; in proofreading)
活かす 【いかす】
